overview: While setting up the tree in Wrapped & Ready, Dante Colle and Leeroy Jones decide to have some last minute naughty time before Christmas. Dacotah Red's not having the best day. Not only is he nursing an injury, he's dealing with his clingy stepbrother Johnny Hill constantly checking on him. Tristan Hunter always wanted a big brother growing up, and now that his stepbrother Johnny Hill has come back from his semester to meet the family his father has married into, Tristan has his wish. But he's about to get a Christmas bonus when he finds out Johnny is packing more than just misletoe in his stocking. Greyson Lane and his older step-brother have a quiet understanding between the two of them. Max King II is usually deployed so when he comes home on leave, Greyson knows one of the first things he'll want to do is rekindle what they have started ever since their parents married a few years ago.
title: Wrapped & Ready
